TextView.android:text:
Q. How do i use Notify me? It is very simple to use notify me , you just have to select the proper function and contact number and click on appropriate button.
Q. How can I use it to notify my friends about extra class if he is asleep? You just have to go to group option then select branch and then the friend's contact number and send notification.
Q. How can I use the app to know I should email or try to videochat with my friend? You can use Who's online feature to check which of the friends are online , and then only contact by internet to the friends who are connected to internet.
Q. How can i request a friend to call me back? You can use the call me friend to get a call from your friend.
